description.value: Your intense magical studies have taught you how to watch out for signs of magic even when looking for other things. When you're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Search]{Searching}, you also gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Detect Magic] exploration activity unless you choose not to.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
